Literature.Title: A new group of antifungal and antibacterial lipopeptides derived from non-membrane active peptides conjugated to palmitic acid
Literature.Author: Avrahami D, Shai Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(MIC=30µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(MIC=1.25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=7.5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=15µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=15µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=25µM),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC MYA-422(MIC=3.125µM),Aspergillus fumigatus ATCC 26430(MIC=>100µM),Aspergillus flavus ATCC 9643(MIC=>100µM),Aspergillus niger ATCC 9642(MIC=>100µM)
